animeDescription: Based on the erotic game by Guilty eX.Tanabe Yoshiyuki disappeared and it was discovered he was bullied in school. Nagisa, Yoshiyuki's cousin, decided to dress up as a male in order to find out what happened to him and to exact revenge on those responsible for the bullying.(Source: HentaiTake)
animeStaff: [['Yamamoto, Toshiyuki', 'Producer'], ['Yokoyama, Hiromi', 'Director'], ['Kimura, Takeshi', 'Episode Director, Character Design, Animation Director']]
